name: All In Your Head
text: Give to the Old Man Quill player. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for Guardians of the Galaxy...? and reveal it. If Guardians of the Galaxy...? did not enter play this way, this card gains surge. Discard All In Your Head.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy...?
text: [[Guard]]. [[Patrol]]. Forced Interrupt: When a friendly character takes damage, increase that damage by 1. (Old Man Quill's nemesis minion.)

flavor: "You're all dead... Just like everyone else I cared about." —Star-Lord
name: Last Living Super Hero
text: Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase begins, deal 1 damage to each friendly character. [crisis]

name: Everybody Dies
text: When Revealed: Take damage equal to the printed hit points of the ally on top of the [[GUARDIAN]] deck.

flavor: "A hero would have died with the rest of us."
name: Unforgiven
text: [[Condition]]. Treat attached ally as a minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Put the top card of the [[GUARDIAN]] deck into play engaged with you with Unforgiven attached to it.
